name: cov-multiple-subscription
description: Represents a Change of Value (COV) subscription for monitoring multiple properties across multiple objects in BACnet.

fields.name: recipient
fields.description: The recipient process that will receive COV notifications.

fields.name: issue-confirmed-notifications
fields.description: Indicates whether confirmed notifications should be issued to the recipient.

fields.name: time-remaining
fields.description: The remaining time in seconds before this subscription expires.

fields.name: max-notification-delay
fields.description: The maximum time in seconds that notifications may be delayed for batching.

fields.name: list-of-cov-subscription-specifications
monitored-object-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the object being monitored for changes.

fields.name: list-of-cov-references
monitored-property
fields.description: Reference to the property being monitored for changes.

fields.name: cov-increment
fields.description: The minimum change in value required to trigger a notification. Optional.

fields.name: timestamped
fields.description: Indicates whether the property value should include a timestamp.
A list of property references and their COV monitoring parameters.
A list of object and property specifications for COV monitoring.
